name: ni-microservice-nodejs
description: NumericaIdeas NodeJS basic microservice for server (EC2) and cloud function (Lambda) deployments.
author: NumericaIdeas Network

scripts.create-lambda: tsc && claudia create --name NiMicroService --region us-east-1 --handler bin/lambda.handler --deploy-proxy-api --set-env-from-json dev.json --use-s3-bucket ni-deployments --s3-key ni-microservice-dev.zip --timeout 900 --memory 1024 --aws-retries 0 --policies policies --runtime nodejs20.x
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run get-vars:dev && tsc && claudia update --version dev --set-env-from-json dev.json --use-s3-bucket ni-deployments --s3-key ni-microservice-dev.zip
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run get-vars:prod && tsc && claudia update --version prod --set-env-from-json prod.json --use-s3-bucket ni-deployments --s3-key ni-microservice-prod.zip
scripts.job:warm:dev: claudia add-scheduled-event --event events/warm.json --name ni-microservice-job-warm-dev --version dev --rate '5 minutes'
scripts.job:warm:prod: claudia add-scheduled-event --event events/warm.json --name ni-microservice-job-warm-prod --version prod --rate '5 minutes'
